name: Iron Knife
description: The Iron Knife is an upgrade in damage and durability from the Bone Knife , the Iron Knife can be used as either a melee weapon or tool. It is also the first knife capable of skinning larger fauna such as the Grizzly Bear and Buffalo . An attachment slot is available, allowing for the application of Tool Attachment Packs at an Alteration Bench / Advanced Alteration Bench .
